/* order.cart.selectCartProdInfo */ SELECT DISPGOOD.DISP_GOOD_ID , GOOD.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , GOOD.GOOD_NAME , GOODVENDOR.SMALL_IMG_PATH , BORGS.BORGNM , GOODVENDOR.GOOD_ST_SPEC_DESC , GOODVENDOR.GOOD_SPEC_DESC , GOOD.ORDER_UNIT AS ORDE_CLAS_CODE , DISPGOOD.SELL_PRICE , CART.ORDE_REQU_QUAN , GOODVENDOR.DELI_MINI_DAY , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10) , DATEADD(DAY , CONVERT(INT , GOODVENDOR.DELI_MINI_DAY) , GETDATE() ),121)+'('+CONVERT(VARCHAR,GOODVENDOR.DELI_MINI_DAY)+'일)' AS STAN_DELI_DAY , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10) , DATEADD(DAY , CONVERT(INT , GOODVENDOR.DELI_MINI_DAY) , GETDATE() ),121) AS requ_deli_date , CONVERT(DECIMAL(15, 2) , DISPGOOD.SELL_PRICE ) * CONVERT(DECIMAL(5, 0) , CART.ORDE_REQU_QUAN ) AS TOTALAMOUNT , GOODVENDOR.DELI_MINI_QUAN , CASE WHEN GOOD.GOOD_TYPE = '10' then '일반' WHEN GOOD.GOOD_TYPE = '20' then '지정' WHEN GOOD.GOOD_TYPE = '30' then '수탁' end as GOOD_CLAS_CODE , DISPGOOD.CUST_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , GOODVENDOR.VENDORID , GOODVENDOR.original_Img_Path , GOOD.isDistribute , ISNULL(Good.is_add_good,0) AS is_add_good FROM MRCARTPROD CART WITH(NOLOCK) , MCDISPLAYGOOD DISPGOOD WITH(NOLOCK) , MCGOODVENDOR GOODVENDOR WITH(NOLOCK) , MCGOOD GOOD WITH(NOLOCK) , SMPBORGS BORGS WITH(NOLOCK) , DBO.FNS_DISP_GOODINFO_FOR_ADMIN(#{groupid} , #{clientid} , #{branchid}) DISPINFO WHERE CART.disp_good_id = DISPGOOD.disp_good_id AND DISPGOOD.good_iden_numb = GOODVENDOR.good_iden_numb AND DISPGOOD.vendorid = GOODVENDOR.vendorid AND GOODVENDOR.good_iden_numb = GOOD.good_iden_numb AND GOODVENDOR.vendorid = BORGS.BORGID AND DISPGOOD.good_iden_numb = DISPINFO.good_iden_numb AND DISPGOOD.vendorid = DISPINFO.vendorid AND DISPGOOD.final_good_sts = '1' AND GOODVENDOR.ISUSE = '1' AND CART.GROUPID = #{groupid} AND CART.CLIENTID = #{clientid} AND CART.BRANCHID = #{branchid} AND CART.USERID = #{userid}

) VALUES( #{branchid} /* branchid 사업장ID */ , #{userid} /* userid 사용자ID */ , '' /* comp_iden_name 공사명 */ , '10' /* orde_type_clas 주문유형 */ , '' /* tran_deta_addr 배송지주소 */ , '' /* tran_user_name 인수자 */ , '' /* tran_tele_numb 인수자연락처 */ , '' /* mana_user_name 관리자 */ , '' /* orde_text_desc 비고 */ , '' /* firstattachseq 첨부파일1 */ , '' /* secondattachseq 첨부파일2 */ , '' /* thirdattachseq 첨부파일3 */ )
mapper.select: /* order.cart.selectCateProdCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM mrcartprod CATEPROD WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE CATEPROD.branchid = #{branchid} AND CATEPROD.userid = #{userid} AND CATEPROD.good_iden_numb = #{good_iden_numb} AND CATEPROD.vendorid = #{vendorid}
mapper.insert: /* order.cart.insertProductInCart */ INSERT INTO MRCARTPROD ( BRANCHID , USERID , GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , VENDORID , ORDE_REQU_QUAN , REGI_DATE_TIME , ADD_REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , COMMON_OPTION )VALUES( #{branchid} , #{userid} , #{good_iden_numb} , #{vendorid} , #{orde_requ_quan} , GETDATE() , #{add_repre_good_iden_numb} , #{repre_good_iden_numb} , #{common_option} )
mapper.update: /* order.cart.updateCartMstInfo */ UPDATE mrcart SET comp_iden_name = #{comp_iden_name} /* 공사명 */ , orde_type_clas = #{orde_type_clas} /* 주문유형 */ , tran_deta_addr_seq = #{tran_deta_addr_seq} /* 배송지주소 */ , tran_user_name = #{tran_user_name} /* 인수자 */ , tran_tele_numb = #{tran_tele_numb} /* 인수자연락처 */ , mana_user_name = #{mana_user_name} /* 관리자 */ , orde_text_desc = #{orde_text_desc} /* 비고 */ , firstattachseq = #{firstattachseq} /* 첨부파일1 */ , secondattachseq = #{secondattachseq} /* 첨부파일2 */ WHERE branchid = #{branchid} /* 사업장ID */ AND userid = #{userid} /* 사업장ID */

/* order.cart.getBuyCartInfo */
SELECT AA.* FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY ISNULL(B.ADD_REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB, B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB)) RANK , ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY ISNULL(B.ADD_REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB, B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB) ORDER BY B.REGI_DATE_TIME) AS PDTGROUP , B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , C.GOOD_NAME --, C.GOOD_SPEC , ISNULL(C.GOOD_SPEC,'')+' '+ISNULL(B.COMMON_OPTION,'') + CASE WHEN (B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB!='') THEN (SELECT ' ('+Z.GOOD_SPEC+')' FROM MCGOOD Z WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Z.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB) ELSE '' END AS GOOD_SPEC , D.SELL_PRICE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(C.VENDOR_EXPOSE, 'Y') = 'Y' THEN E.BORGNM ELSE 'SKTS' END AS VENDORNM , B.VENDORID , B.ORDE_REQU_QUAN , D.SELL_PRICE * B.ORDE_REQU_QUAN AS ORD_PRICE , B.ADD_REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , B.COMMON_OPTION , B.USERID , B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB , C.GOOD_TYPE AS GOOD_CLAS_CODE , ISNULL(C.ADD_GOOD, 'N') AS ADD_GOOD , ISNULL(C.REPRE_GOOD, 'N') AS REPRE_GOOD , D.DELI_MINI_DAY , B.REGI_DATE_TIME , D.SALE_UNIT_PRIC , DBO.FNS_DATE_CALC(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),121),D.DELI_MINI_DAY) AS DELI_DATE , CASE WHEN ISNULL(G.SKTS_IMG,'DIFF_IMG') = 'DIFF_IMG' THEN CASE WHEN C.SKTS_IMG = 'Y' THEN ISNULL(C.SKTS_LARGE_IMG_PATH, '') ELSE ISNULL(D.LARGE_IMG_PATH, '') END ELSE CASE WHEN G.SKTS_IMG = 'Y' THEN ISNULL(G.SKTS_LARGE_IMG_PATH, '') ELSE ISNULL(H.LARGE_IMG_PATH, '') END END AS IMG_PATH , DBO.FNS_ISDISPLAY_PRODUCT( ISNULL(B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB,B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB) , B.VENDORID, #{userInfoDto.areaType}, #{userInfoDto.workId}, #{userInfoDto.borgId}) AS DISPLAY_YN , D.MAKE_COMP_NAME , ISNULL(CONVERT(VARCHAR,D.DELI_MINI_QUAN),'0') AS DELI_MINI_QUAN FROM MRCART A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MRCARTPROD B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BRANCHID = B.BRANCHID AND A.USERID = B.USERID INNER JOIN MCGOOD C WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = C.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB INNER JOIN MCGOODVENDOR D WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = D.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB AND B.VENDORID = D.VENDORID AND D.ISUSE = '1' AND D.SELL_PRICE > 0 INNER JOIN SMPBORGS E WITH(NOLOCK) ON D.VENDORID = E.BORGID AND E.ISUSE = '1' LEFT OUTER JOIN MCGOOD G WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = G.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB LEFT OUTER JOIN MCGOODVENDOR H WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = H.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB AND B.VENDORID = H.VENDORID AND H.ISUSE = '1' AND H.SELL_PRICE > 0 WHERE A.BRANCHID = #{branchid} AND A.USERID = #{userid} ) AA WHERE AA.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AA.RANK DESC, AA.PDTGROUP

/* order.cart.selectCartCount */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DBO.FNS_ISDISPLAY_PRODUCT( ISNULL( B.ADD_REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB, ISNULL( B.REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB, B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB ) ), B.VENDORID, #{areaType}, #{workId}, #{branchid} ) AS DISPLAY_YN FROM MRCART A WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MRCARTPROD B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.BRANCHID = B.BRANCHID AND A.USERID = B.USERID INNER JOIN MCGOOD C WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = C.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB INNER JOIN MCGOODVENDOR D WITH(NOLOCK) ON B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = D.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB AND B.VENDORID = D.VENDORID AND D.ISUSE = '1' INNER JOIN SMPBORGS E WITH(NOLOCK) ON D.VENDORID = E.BORGID AND E.ISUSE = '1' WHERE A.BRANCHID = #{branchid} AND A.USERID = #{userid} AND D.SELL_PRICE > 0 ) AA WHERE AA.DISPLAY_YN = 'Y'

/* order.cart.selectCartChkAddProductSubInfo2 */ SELECT ISNULL(B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB,C.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB) AS ADD_PROD_ID , (CASE WHEN B.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS IS_MST_YN FROM MRCARTPROD A WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN MRCARTPROD B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = B.ADD_REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB AND A.BRANCHID = A.BRANCHID AND A.USERID = B.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN MRCARTPROD C WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.ADD_REPRE_GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = C.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB AND A.BRANCHID = C.BRANCHID AND A.USERID = C.USERID WHERE A.BRANCHID = #{branchid} AND A.USERID= #{userid} AND A.GOOD_IDEN_NUMB = #{good_iden_numb} AND A.VENDORID = #{vendorid}
